cursorMovement.title: Mutarea cursorului

commands.W: sari la inceputul cuvantului (cuvintele pot contine semne de punctuatie)
commands.E: sari la sfarsitul cuvantului (cuvintele pot contine semne de punctuatie)
commands.B: sari inapoi la inceputul cuvantului (cuvintele pot contine semne de punctuatie)
commands.ge: jump backwards to the end of a word
commands.gE: jump backwards to the end of a word (words can contain punctuation)
commands.caret: sari la primul caracter care nu e liber de la inceputul liniei
commands.g_: sari la ultimul caracter non-blank al liniei
commands.gg: dute la prima linie a documentului
commands.G: dute la ultima linie a documentului
commands.fx: dute la urmatoarea referinta a caracterului x
commands.tx: dute la referinta precendenta a caracterului x
commands.closeCurlyBrace: sari la urmatorul paragraf (sau functie/bloc, cand editezi cod)
commands.topCursor: position cursor on top of the screen
commands.bottomCursor: position cursor on bottom of the screen
commands.operCurlyBrace: sari la paragraful anterior (sau functie/bloc, cand editezi cod)

cursorMovement.tip: Prefixeaza comanda de miscare a cursorului cu un numar pentru a o repeta. De exemplu, <kbd>4j</kbd> muta cursorul cu 4 linii in jos.

commands.o: adauga (deschide) o noua linie sub linia curenta
commands.O: adauga (deschide) o noua linie inaintea liniei curente
commands.ctrlPlush: delete the character before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusw: delete word before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusj: begin new line during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlust: indent (move right) line one shiftwidth during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusd: de-indent (move left) line one shiftwidth during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusn: insert (auto-complete) next match before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusp: insert (auto-complete) previous match before the cursor during insert mode
commands.ctrlPlusrx: insert the contents of register x
commands.ctrlPlusox: Temporarily enter normal mode to issue one normal-mode command x.

commands.R: replace more than one character, until <kbd>ESC</kbd> is pressed.
commands.J: lipeste lina curenta cu cea dedesubt
commands.gu: change to lowercase up to motion
commands.gU: change to uppercase up to motion

markingText.title: Marcarea textului (modul vizual)

commands.v: incepe modul vizual, marcheaza linii, apoi trimite o comanda (precum <kbd>y</kbd>-copie)
commands.V: incepe modul vizual in relatie cu liniile
commands.CtrlPlusv: incepe modul vizual de tip sectiune
commands.O: dute la celalat colt al sectiunii

markingText.tip1: Instead of <kbd>b</kbd> or <kbd>B</kbd> one can also use <kbd>(</kbd> or <kbd>{</kbd> respectively.

registers.title: Registre

commands.quotePlusy: yank into the system clipboard register
commands.quotePlusp: paste from the system clipboard register

registers.tip1: Registrele sunt salvate in ~/.viminfo, si vor fi incarcate din nou la urmatorul restart

tip2.title: Special registers:
tip2.quote: unnamed register, last delete or yank
tip2.minus: last small (less than a line) delete

marks.title: Insemne

commands.currentPositionA: seteaza pozitia curenta pentru insemnul A
commands.yankToMarkA: copie textul pana la pozitia insemnului A
commands.backtick0: go to the position where Vim was previously exited
commands.backtickQuote: go to the position when last editing this file
commands.backtickDot: go to the position of the last change in this file
commands.backtickBacktick: go to the position before the last jump
commands.ctrlPlusi: go to newer position in jump list
commands.ctrlPluso: go to older position in jump list
commands.gcomma: go to newer position in change list
commands.gsemicolon: go to older position in change list
commands.ctrlPlusCloseSquare: jump to the tag under cursor

marks.tip1: To jump to a mark you can either use a backtick (<kbd>`</kbd>) or an apostrophe (<kbd>'</kbd>). Using an apostrophe jumps to the beginning (first non-blank) of the line holding the mark.

global.title: Global
global.tip1: Run <kbd>vimtutor</kbd> in a terminal to learn the first Vim commands.

commands.yaw: copie cuvantul de sub cursor si spatiul dinaintea lui
commands.gp: put (paste) the clipboard after cursor and leave cursor after the new text
commands.gP: put (paste) before cursor and leave cursor after the new text
commands.daw: sterge (taie) cuvantul de sub cursor si spatiul de dinainte si dupa el
commands.gNotPatternD: delete all lines not containing pattern

tip1.title: You can also use the following characters to specify the range:

commands.dotCommaDollarD: From the current line to the end of the file
commands.dotCommaOneD: From the current line to the beginning of the file
commands.tenCommaDollarD: From the 10th line to the end of the file

commands.greaterThanPercent: indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)
commands.=Percent: re-indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)
commands.closeSquarep: paste and adjust indent to current line
commands.lessThanPercent: de-indent a block with () or {} (cursor on brace)

commands.colonwq: salveaza fisierul si iesi din program
commands.colonx: salveaza fisierul si iesi din program
commands.colonq: iesi din program (nu iese daca fisierul nu este salvat)
commands.colonqbang: iesi si sterge modificarile din fisier

commands.backslashVpattern: sablon 'foarte magic': caracterele non-alfanumerice sunt interpretate ca symboluri regex (nu e nevoie de escaping)
commands.colonPercentForwardSlashOldForwardSlashN: inlocuieste peste tot old cu new in fisier
inlocuieste peste tot old cu new in fisier cu confirmare

commands.colonvimgrep: cauta dupa sablon in fisiere multiple
commands.coloncopen: deschide o fereastra care contine lista de potriviri

commands.colone: editeaza fisierul respectin intr-un nou buffer
commands.colonls: arata o lista cu bufferele deschise
commands.colonbfile: go to a buffer by file
commands.colonsp: deschide fisierul intr-un buffer now si imparte fereastra
commands.colonvsp: deschide fisierul intr-un buffer now si imparte fereastra vertical
commands.colonvertba: edit all buffers as vertical windows
commands.ctrlPluswx: exchange current window with next one
commands.ctrlPlusw=: make all windows equal height & width
commands.ctrlPluswh: muta cursorul in fereastra din stanga (vertical)
commands.ctrlPluswl: muta cursorul in fereastra din dreapta (vertical)
commands.ctrlPluswj: muta cursorul in fereastra de sus (orizontal)
commands.ctrlPluswk: muta cursorul in fereastra de jos (orizontal)
commands.ctrlPluswH: make current window full height at far left (leftmost vertical window)
commands.ctrlPluswL: make current window full height at far right (rightmost vertical window)
commands.ctrlPluswJ: make current window full width at the very bottom (bottommost horizontal window)
commands.ctrlPluswK: make current window full width at the very top (topmost horizontal window)

commands.ctrlPluswT: muta fereastra curenta in propriul tab
commands.colontabc: inchide tabul curent si toate ferestrele lui
commands.colontabo: inchide toate taburile in afara de cel curent
commands.colontabdo: ruleaza comanda in toate taburile (ex :tabo q - inchide toate taburile deschise)

diff.title: Diff

commands.zf: manually define a fold up to motion
commands.zr: reduce (open) all folds by one level
commands.zm: fold more (close) all folds by one level
commands.closeSquarec: jump to start of next change
commands.openSquarec: jump to start of previous change
commands.colonDiffthis: make current window part of diff
commands.colonDiffoff: switch off diff mode for current window

diff.tip1: The commands for folding (e.g. <kbd>za</kbd>) operate on one level. To operate on all levels, use uppercase letters (e.g. <kbd>zA</kbd>).
diff.tip2: To view the differences of files, one can directly start Vim in diff mode by running <kbd>vimdiff</kbd> in a terminal. One can even set this as <kbd>git difftool</kbd>.
